decision_conditions: <span id="docs-internal-guid-1a431dec-7fff-4309-224a-f28e58559b71"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation of the outbuilding hereby approved full details of seven cycle parking spaces including location, storage, product images and material shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing. The cycle store shall be implemented prior to occupation in accordance with the approved details and retained and maintained in perpetuity.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">To </span><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7776f69-7fff-51d8-44ec-c05b36b811e2"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">promote sustainable transport by prioritising cycling in the Borough</span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"> and that the details of the cycle store is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p></span>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ebe197da-7fff-d5ee-746c-9edcf0d00308"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The outbuilding, hereby approved, shall operate only between the hours of 0700 to 1700 Monday to Saturday, and shall not operate on Sundays or bank holidays. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-1e1af4ee-7fff-2551-f5ed-39d2b6daa2b8"><span style="font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: In the interests of neighbouring amenities. </span></span><br></p><div><span style="font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-4e967854-7fff-2290-8ca8-6b15e1471e75"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#222222;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">The total noise level from fixed plants shall be 10 dB(A) or more below the measured LA90 level at the nearest noise sensitive premises at any time. The method of assessment shall be carried in accordance with. BS4142: 2014: Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound.&nbsp; Before commencement of the use hereby permitted a test shall be carried out to show that the above criterion shall be met and the results submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval</span>.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#222222;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#222222;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-035a4999-7fff-a2e7-cf18-c1a8caaa3713"></span></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-c4b2d050-7fff-7e82-c1db-c666f2ae4561"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise.</span></span><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">No sound-amplifying equipment, loudspeakers, or public address system shall be installed or operated within the outbuilding, hereby approved.&nbsp;</span><br></p><span id="docs-internal-guid-4f755ff8-7fff-f8e5-abb1-112b0c001f03"><br></span><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;">Reason:</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"> To protect the occupants of nearby residential properties from noise disturbance. </span></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The outbuilding shall be used as an assembly hall, library, and/or storage purposes in connection with the existing school only and shall <span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline;">not be used for any other purposes within Class F1(f) or for </span><span style="background-color: transparent;">social, leisure, school, or commercial activities including </span>additional classrooms. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Any alternative use of the building hereby approved will require written approval by the local planning authority. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><font face="Arial"><span style="white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: In the interests of neighbouring residential amenities and safeguarding the local highway network. </span></font></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-1efa7c5f-7fff-e211-7ba2-dbfb2bcafc19"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">No development shall commence, other than works of demolition, until a report (including intrusive investigation/trial pit and monitoring where necessary) demonstrating that the basement and lightwell development will not increase the potential for groundwater flooding to itself or to the surrounding area during and post-construction has been submitted to the local planning authority for approval. Where groundwater is identified as a potential risk, details of appropriate controls including flood resilience and/or resistance measures shall be submitted to the LPA for approval, and the approved measures incorporated before the basement is occupied. The basement shall be constructed and completed in accordance with the approved plans in line with BS 8102:2022 Protection of below-ground structures against water ingress - code of practice.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To safeguard against land contamination.</span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
description: Erection of basement and ground floor outbuilding to rear garden to provide assembly room at basement and library at ground floor.
